SELECT DATE_FORMAT(${params.xColumn},'%Y-%m-%d') ${params.xColumn}, IFNULL(
sum(${params.yColumn}) count(${params.yColumn}) max(${params.yColumn}) min(${params.yColumn}) ROUND(avg(${params.yColumn}), 2) sum(${params.yColumn})
, 0) total FROM forum 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} group by DATE_FORMAT(${params.xColumn},'%Y-%m-%d')

-- 1、按年和周数值分组 -- 2、先按年降序，再按周降序 SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(${params.xColumn}), '年 第', WEEK(${params.xColumn}, 1), '周') AS ${params.xColumn}, IFNULL(
sum(${params.yColumn}) count(${params.yColumn}) max(${params.yColumn}) min(${params.yColumn}) ROUND(avg(${params.yColumn}), 2) sum(${params.yColumn})
, 0) total FROM forum 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} GROUP BY YEAR(${params.xColumn}), WEEK(${params.xColumn}, 1) ORDER BY YEAR(${params.xColumn}) DESC, WEEK(${params.xColumn}, 1) DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(${params.xColumn},'%Y-%m') ${params.xColumn}, IFNULL(
sum(${params.yColumn}) count(${params.yColumn}) max(${params.yColumn}) min(${params.yColumn}) ROUND(avg(${params.yColumn}), 2) sum(${params.yColumn})
, 0) total FROM forum 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} group by DATE_FORMAT(${params.xColumn},'%Y-%m')

SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(${params.xColumn}), ' - ', ELT(QUARTER(${params.xColumn}), '第一季度', '第二季度', '第三季度', '第四季度')) as ${params.xColumn}, IFNULL(
sum(${params.yColumn}) count(${params.yColumn}) max(${params.yColumn}) min(${params.yColumn}) ROUND(avg(${params.yColumn}), 2) sum(${params.yColumn})
, 0) total FROM forum 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} group by CONCAT(YEAR(${params.xColumn}), ' - ', ELT(QUARTER(${params.xColumn}), '第一季度', '第二季度', '第三季度', '第四季度'))

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(${params.xColumn},'%Y') ${params.xColumn}, IFNULL(

, 0) total FROM forum 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} group by DATE_FORMAT(${params.xColumn},'%Y')
